<button class="p-1.5 text-slate-500 hover:text-primary rounded hover:bg-slate-100 dark:hover:bg-slate-700" title="Duplicate">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[18px]">content_copy</span>
</button>
<button class="p-1.5 text-slate-500 hover:text-red-600 rounded hover:bg-slate-100 dark:hover:bg-slate-700" title="Delete">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-[18px]">delete</span>
</button>
</div>
</td>
</tr>

<p class="text-sm text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-300 leading-relaxed">
                                            Automatic inventory check failed for Work Order #4922. Required 500 units of "Aluminum Alloy 6061-T6 Sheet", but strictly 420 units available in primary Warehouse A. System blocked production release to prevent line stoppage.
                                        </p>
</div>
<div class="pt-4 border-t border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800">

<p class="text-sm text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-300 leading-relaxed">
                                            Late delivery from supplier "MetalCorp Inc". PO-9921 was expected on Jan 20th but has been rescheduled to Jan 25th without system update.
                                        </p>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<!-- Right Inspector Panel -->
<aside class="w-[360px] flex flex-col bg-white dark:bg-[#1a2632] rounded-2xl border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-xl shadow-slate-200/50 dark:shadow-black/20 overflow-hidden shrink-0">
<div class="p-5 border-b border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 flex justify-between items-start bg-slate-50/50 dark:bg-slate-800/20">
<div>
<div class="flex items-center gap-2 mb-1">
<h3 class="font-bold text-lg text-slate-900 dark:text-white">EX-2023-849</h3>
<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-slate-400 text-[18px] cursor-pointer hover:text-primary">content_copy</span>
</div>
<div class="flex items-center gap-2">
<span class="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 rounded text-[11px] font-semibold bg-red-100 text-red-700 dark:bg-red-900/30 dark:text-red-400 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-800 uppercase tracking-wide">
                                    Critical
                                </span>
<span class="text-xs text-slate-500 border-l border-slate-300 dark:border-slate-700 pl-2">Machine Failure</span>
</div>
</div>
<button class="text-slate-400 hover:text-slate-600 dark:hover:text-slate-300">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined">close</span>
</button>
</div>
<div class="flex-1 overflow-y-auto p-5 custom-scrollbar space-y-6">
<!-- Section: Full Resolution Notes -->
<div class="space-y-2">
<div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-slate-900 dark:text-white font-semibold text-sm">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-primary text-[20px]">description</span>
                                Full Resolution Notes
                            </div>
<div class="bg-slate-50 dark:bg-slate-900/50 p-3 rounded-xl text-sm text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-300 border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800 leading-relaxed">
<p>Replaced defective thermal sensor on Line 4 (Unit #402). The sensor was reading sporadic values causing the safety interlock to trigger. System recalibrated and tested for 3 cycles. Operations resumed at 09:42 AM.</p>
</div>
</div>
<!-- Section: Root Cause -->
<div class="space-y-2">
<div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-slate-900 dark:text-white font-semibold text-sm">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-primary text-[20px]">manage_search</span>
                                Root Cause Analysis
                            </div>
<p class="text-sm text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400 pl-7">
                                Moisture ingress in the sensor housing due to a degraded seal. This compromised the internal electronics.
                            </p>
</div>
<!-- Section: Preventive Action -->
<div class="space-y-2">
<div class="flex items-center gap-2 text-slate-900 dark:text-white font-semibold text-sm">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined text-primary text-[20px]">shield</span>
                                Preventive Action Plans
                            </div>
<ul class="list-disc pl-11 text-sm text-slate-600 dark:text-slate-400 space-y-1 marker:text-primary">
<li>Scheduled inspection of all thermal sensor seals across Line 4.</li>
<li>Updated PM checklist to include seal integrity check every 2 weeks.</li>
<li>Ordered IP67 rated replacement sensors for future stock.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<!-- Attachments -->
<div class="space-y-3 pt-4 border-t border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800">
<div class="flex items-center justify-between text-slate-900 dark:text-white font-semibold text-sm">
<span>Attachments (2)</span>
<button class="text-primary text-xs font-medium hover:underline">Download All</button>
</div>
<div class="flex gap-3 overflow-x-auto pb-2">
<div class="shrink-0 w-24 h-24 rounded-lg bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 bg-cover bg-center relative group cursor-pointer" data-alt="Sensor photo" style="background-image: url('https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/aida-public/AB6AXuDOxyS0sSIxw7hSAJNgqlYuKi3abbF1lgM7DkynnZnG5J305MDB6xlMfoVIbkTwi7F2MxsQj8WSc-efO22kRcfglhxOKk0ar7k87KQqHB-ACa6Ou-cOQ2qTD-0ZTnIF0QCptMihSME7y2fzVZyx8o6roBh9XpEBLzJpSUQxR7B2WpAcCbprcTuSOC0s6hH7gyaSivD3uz0xp3MsfLSFdK9VeIDMgKSVb5r16qmSCaMqWI1kClVcpektVD5Hpf8B0qI7FhrhC9rn088')">
<div class="absolute inset-0 bg-black/40 flex items-center justify-center opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity rounded-lg">

<div class="shrink-0 w-24 h-24 rounded-lg bg-slate-100 dark:bg-slate-800 border border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-700 bg-cover bg-center relative group cursor-pointer" data-alt="Report scan" style="background-image: url('https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/aida-public/AB6AXuB_0kiJW1lvuiG25Kw0Prt8HY1182eGBYJrGnHZFNgCeSeA01ho277wvlCuI5h9ox-hdVlLVJp_kmr-TqnNCH_6UT15l4ZpzDF-0txwiGI6D1PkrvYd_CNIYXjREK40QSPcgv7nNSBZHGMFzZ3FZRM9UxMu2lw-NeKWkr6j1ybWYT7S-7nxqkej7PbwHkpVJZobVaExxu8WN0sTqGyDgMK0ckbTX95gBFClrRaTrbscbzDSeB9p3T4TjUvSJ77uVoJbEtDGCGYPBME')">

        /* Hide scrollbar for clean UI but keep functionality */
        .no-scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar {
            display: none;
        }
        .no-scrollbar {
            -ms-overflow-style: none;
            scrollbar-width: none;
        }
    </style>

</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</section>

<!-- Toggle Switch (Active) -->

<span aria-hidden="true" class="translate-x-5 pointer-events-none inline-block h-5 w-5 transform rounded-full bg-white shadow ring-0 transition duration-200 ease-in-out"></span>
</button>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<!-- Section 4: Exception Thresholds -->
<div class="flex flex-col rounded-2xl bg-white p-6 shadow-sm border border-slate-100 dark:bg-[#111a22] dark:border-slate-800">
<div class="mb-5 flex items-center gap-3">
<div class="flex h-10 w-10 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-rose-50 text-rose-600 dark:bg-rose-900/20 dark:text-rose-400">
<span class="material-symbols-outlined">warning</span>
</div>
<h2 class="text-lg font-bold text-slate-900 dark:text-white">Exception Thresholds</h2>
</div>
<div class="space-y-5">
<div>
<label class="mb-2 block text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-300">Delay Tolerance</label>
<div class="relative">
<input class="w-full rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 px-4 py-2.5 text-slate-900 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary dark:border-slate-700 dark:bg-slate-800 dark:text-white" type="number" value="4"/>
<div class="pointer-events-none absolute inset-y-0 right-4 flex items-center text-sm text-slate-500">hours</div>
</div>
<p class="mt-1.5 text-xs text-slate-500">Allowable delay before flagging critical exception</p>
</div>
<div>
<label class="mb-2 block text-sm font-medium text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-300">Scrap Limit (%)</label>
<div class="relative">
<input class="w-full rounded-xl border-slate-200 bg-slate-50 px-4 py-2.5 text-slate-900 focus:border-primary focus:ring-primary dark:border-slate-700 dark:bg-slate-800 dark:text-white" type="number" value="5"/>
<div class="pointer-events-none absolute inset-y-0 right-4 flex items-center text-sm text-slate-500">%</div>
</div>
<p class="mt-1.5 text-xs text-slate-500">Threshold for production quality alerts</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<!-- Dark Mode Toggle Script (Optional inline for demo) -->
<script>
        const themeBtn = document.querySelector('button[class*="rounded-full flex items-center"]');
        themeBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
            document.documentElement.classList.toggle('dark');
            const icon = themeBtn.querySelector('.material-symbols-outlined');
            if (document.documentElement.classList.contains('dark')) {
                icon.textContent = 'dark_mode';
            } else {
                icon.textContent = 'light_mode';
            }
        });
    </script>
</body></html>

<div class="bg-surface-light dark:bg-surface-dark p-5 rounded-xl border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-800 flex flex-col gap-3 relative overflow-hidden group">

                                </button>
